edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.utility

Interface SigmaSimulatorOutput

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SigmaANDSimulatorOutput, SigmaDHExtendedSimulatorOutput, SigmaDHExtendedStatisticalSimulatorOutput, SigmaDHSimulatorOutput, SigmaDJEncryptedZeroSimulatorOutput, SigmaDJKnowledgeSimulatorOutput, SigmaDJProductSimulatorOutput, SigmaDlogSimulatorOutput, SigmaORMultipleSimulatorOutput, SigmaORTwoSimulatorOutput, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeSimulatorOutput

    public interface SigmaSimulatorOutput
    Every sigma simulator outputs the result in the end of it's compute function, but each one can outputs different values.

    This interface is a marker interface for Sigma simulator output, where there is an implementing class for each concrete Sigma protocol.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Detail

      • getA

        SigmaProtocolMsg getA()
        All SigmaSimulators contains first message, challenge and second message. Returns the first message.
        Returns:
        a - first message

      • getE

        byte[] getE()
        All SigmaSimulators contains first message, challenge and second message. Returns the challenge.
        Returns:
        e - challenge

      • getZ

        SigmaProtocolMsg getZ()
        All SigmaSimulators contains first message, challenge and second message. Returns the second message.
        Returns:
        z - second message
